acolyte.title: Acolyte
acolyte.description: You spent your life in service to a temple, studying religious rites and ceremonies. Your faith guides your actions and beliefs.
ideals: Charity. I always try to help those in need.
Tradition. The rituals of the past must be preserved.
Faith. I trust that my deity will guide me.
Aspiration. I seek to rise to the highest levels of my faith.
Community. My faith brings us together.
Change. We must help others adapt and grow spiritually.
bonds: I would die to protect the temple where I served.
I owe my life to the priest who took me in.
Everything I do is for the greater glory of my faith.
I seek to preserve an ancient relic of my faith.
Someone I loved was lost because of my faith, and I must atone.
flaws: I am blindly trusting of those who profess faith.
I am inflexible in my thinking.
I judge others harshly and myself even more so.
I put too much trust in those of authority within my temple.
My piety sometimes leads me to overlook practical matters.
talents: offer last rites in multiple languages
sense spiritual unrest in a place

charlatan.title: Charlatan
charlatan.description: You have always had a way with people, bending truths, forging documents, and creating false identities to get what you want.
ideals: Independence. I am a free spirit—no one tells me what to do.
Fairness. I never target people who can't afford to lose a few coins.
Charity. I distribute the gains of my cons to those in need.
Creativity. I never run the same con twice.
Friendship. Bonds between companions are the true treasure.
Aspiration. I’m determined to make something of myself.
bonds: I owe everything to my mentor—a horrible person who's probably rotting in jail somewhere.
Somewhere out there, I have a child who doesn’t know me.
I come from a noble family, and I am pretending to be someone else to escape my past.
A powerful person wronged me, and I will exact revenge.
I swindled the wrong person and must work to ensure they never cross paths with me again.
flaws: I can't resist a pretty face.
I'm always in debt.
I'm convinced that no one could ever fool me the way I fool others.
I'm too greedy for my own good.
I can't resist taking a risk if there's money involved.
talents: sell a lie with absolute confidence

criminal.title: Criminal
criminal.description: You have a history of breaking the law, working as a burglar, smuggler, enforcer, or worse. You understand the criminal underworld's codes and connections.
equipment: Set of dark common clothes with hood
ideals: Honor. I don’t steal from others in the trade.
Freedom. Chains are meant to be broken.
Charity. I steal from the rich and give to the poor.
Greed. I will do whatever it takes for money.
Redemption. There’s a spark of good in everyone.
Community. I work with others to survive.
bonds: I’m trying to pay off an old debt I owe to a generous benefactor.
I’m loyal to my crew above all else.
Someone I loved died because of a mistake I made.
I was framed for a crime I didn’t commit.
I owe my life to the organization that took me in.
flaws: When I see something valuable, I can’t think about anything but how to steal it.
When faced with a choice between money and my friends, I usually choose money.
If there’s a plan, I’ll forget it. If I don’t forget it, I’ll ignore it.
I can’t resist swindling people who are more powerful than me.
I turn tail and run when things look bad.
talents: case a room in under five seconds
break into windows without leaving a trace

entertainer.title: Entertainer
entertainer.description: You thrive in front of an audience, whether performing music, storytelling, or dramatic feats. You have a way of captivating and influencing others.
ideals: Beauty. Art should reflect the beauty in all things.
Tradition. The stories, legends, and songs of the past must never be forgotten.
Creativity. The world is in need of new ideas and bold action.
Greed. I’m only in it for the money and fame.
People. I like seeing the smiles on people's faces when I perform.
Honesty. Art should come from the heart.
bonds: My instrument is my most treasured possession.
Someone stole my precious performance prop, and I want it back.
I once performed for a noble who still seeks me out.
I’ll do anything to prove myself superior to a rival performer.
A terrible mistake ruined my reputation. I seek to rebuild it.
flaws: I’ll do anything to win fame and renown.
I have trouble keeping my true feelings hidden. My sharp tongue lands me in trouble.
Despite my best efforts, I am always caught up in scandal.
I’ll do anything to get a laugh, even if it’s inappropriate.
I once satirized a noble who still wants my head.
talents: hold a note longer than seems possible
draw a crowd with a single gesture
twirl a baton or instrument with flair

folk_hero.title: Folk Hero
folk_hero.description: You come from humble beginnings and have stood up against oppression, earning the love and respect of your community.
ideals: Respect. People deserve to be treated with dignity.
Fairness. No one should get preferential treatment.
Freedom. Tyrants must be overthrown.
Community. We must work together to survive.
Destiny. I am destined for great things.
Change. Life is constant change, and we must adapt.
bonds: I protect those who cannot protect themselves.
I fight for the common people.
I am loyal to my family above all else.
A tyrant once wronged my village. I will see them brought to justice.
I worked the land and love it still. I will protect nature.
flaws: I have a strong sense of pride that sometimes blinds me.
I'm quick to assume someone is guilty without proof.
I judge others harshly.
I can be naive about the world’s dangers.
I believe my actions are justified no matter what.
talents: calm angry mobs with simple words
recall stories passed down by elders
inspire courage with a simple gesture
recognize local folk songs from across regions

guild_artisan.title: Guild Artisan
guild_artisan.description: You are a member of a guild of craftsmen or merchants, skilled in a particular trade and respected among artisans.
ideals: Community. It is the duty of all to strengthen the community.
Generosity. My talents are meant to be shared.
Freedom. Everyone should be free to pursue their livelihood.
Greed. I will do whatever it takes to become wealthy.
Aspiration. I seek to prove my worth through my craft.
Tradition. The work of past generations must be honored.
bonds: I owe my guild a great debt.
My tools are symbols of my past and my future.
I protect the reputation of my craft at all costs.
One day I will return to my guild and rise to the top.
I created something precious once and lost it.
flaws: I’m obsessed with winning recognition.
I’m miserly with my wealth.
I’m judgmental of those less skilled than I am.
I hate being wrong and won’t admit it.
I value work over relationships.
talents: evaluate structural integrity at a glance
recite guild codes and contracts from memory

hermit.title: Hermit
hermit.description: You lived in seclusion—either in a sheltered community or alone—for a formative period, pursuing a quest for insight, enlightenment, or escape.
ideals: Self-Knowledge. If you know yourself, there’s nothing left to fear.
Logic. Emotions must not cloud judgment.
Free Thinking. Inquiry and curiosity are the pillars of progress.
Power. Isolation reveals hidden truths and grants power.
Live and Let Live. Meddling in others' affairs leads to trouble.
Aspiration. I seek the perfection of my soul.
bonds: I entered seclusion to hide from those who might harm me.
I’m still seeking the enlightenment I pursued in seclusion.
I keep a secret that could devastate the world.
I discovered a powerful truth I must protect.
I left behind something precious in the world I abandoned.
flaws: I harbor dark, bloodthirsty thoughts.
I let my emotions get the better of me, despite my seclusion.
I secretly believe the world revolves around me.
I am dogmatic in my thoughts and philosophy.
I have trouble trusting others.
talents: forage edible plants in unfamiliar terrain
brew herbal teas for any condition
build small shrines from natural objects
read body language like a book

noble.title: Noble
noble.description: You come from an aristocratic family, and your position carries influence. You understand wealth, privilege, and etiquette.
ideals: Respect. Noble obligation demands courtesy to all.
Responsibility. It is my duty to care for others.
Independence. I must prove I can handle myself.
Power. If I can attain more power, I must.
Family. Blood runs thicker than water.
Aspiration. I seek to rise even higher in status.
bonds: I will face any challenge to uphold my family's honor.
My loyalty to my sovereign is unwavering.
The common folk must see me as a protector.
I have an ancient bloodline that I must protect.
My family lost everything, and I must reclaim our honor.
flaws: I secretly believe that everyone is beneath me.
I have a tendency to overestimate my abilities.
I hide a terrible secret that could ruin my family.
I am too focused on maintaining appearances.
I can be insufferably arrogant.
talents: deliver veiled insults in perfect etiquette

knight.title: Knight
knight.description: You are a mounted warrior sworn to ideals of chivalry, loyalty, and protection. You are part of a noble tradition, whether honored or tarnished.
ideals: Honor. I maintain my principles above all else.
Duty. My cause is more important than my life.
Loyalty. Those who fight beside me are worth protecting.
Glory. I seek fame and renown through my deeds.
Compassion. I will protect the helpless.
Tradition. I uphold the standards of knighthood.
bonds: I am bound to protect my liege lord.
I have sworn fealty to a noble cause.
I carry the memory of a fallen comrade.
I will fight to restore my family's lost honor.
I must defend the weak wherever they are found.
flaws: I have an unhealthy obsession with personal glory.
I am arrogant about my status.
I am rigid in my views and slow to adapt.
I am overly judgmental of others' failures.
I secretly feel unworthy of my knighthood.

outlander.title: Outlander
outlander.description: You grew up in the wilds, far from civilization. You are familiar with nature's ways and the harsh realities of survival.
equipment: Trophy from an animal you killed
ideals: Change. Life is constant change, and we must adapt.
Greater Good. It is each person's responsibility to ensure the survival of the tribe.
Honor. If I dishonor myself, I dishonor my tribe.
Might. The strong survive and the weak perish.
Nature. The natural world is more important than all civilization.
Glory. I must earn glory through my deeds.
bonds: My family is the most important thing in my life.
I will bring terrible wrath down on those who destroy nature.
I suffer from a terrible guilt that haunts me.
I will do anything to defend my homeland.
I pursue a dangerous foe who wronged my people.
flaws: I am slow to trust others from civilized lands.
I am often blunt and tactless.
I find it difficult to live indoors.
I sometimes solve problems with violence first.
I have little respect for rules or laws.
talents: start a fire in any conditions
name any local plant or animal

sage.title: Sage
sage.description: You spent years studying the lore of the multiverse, seeking knowledge and uncovering secrets that few others comprehend.
ideals: Knowledge. The path to power is through knowledge.
Beauty. What is beautiful points us beyond itself toward the divine.
Logic. Emotions must not cloud logical thinking.
Self-Improvement. The goal of a life of study is self-betterment.
No Limits. Nothing should fetter the infinite possibilities.
bonds: I have an ancient text that holds terrible secrets.
One day I will prove myself superior to my old rival.
I’ve been searching my whole life for the answer to a certain question.
I sold my soul for knowledge and am now working to reclaim it.
My life’s work is a series of tomes related to a specific field.
flaws: I am easily distracted by fascinating topics.
I tend to explain everything at length.
I am contemptuous of those less learned than I am.
I have trouble resisting forbidden knowledge.
I can be rigid in my beliefs.
talents: quote obscure tomes word for word
identify magical script at a glance

sailor.title: Sailor
sailor.description: You spent your youth on a ship, learning to live with wind, water, and danger. You are familiar with the workings of vessels and the life of sailors.
ideals: Respect. The thing that keeps a ship together is mutual respect.
Fairness. We all do the work, so we all share in the rewards.
Freedom. The sea is freedom—the freedom to go anywhere and do anything.
Mastery. I'm a master of my trade, and I take pride in it.
People. I am loyal to my crew, not to ideals.
Aspiration. Someday I'll own my own ship.
bonds: I'm loyal to my captain above all else.
The ship is the most important thing in my life.
I was cheated out of my fair share of profits.
A storm took everything from me, and I will never forget it.
Someone I loved was lost at sea, and I seek to honor them.
flaws: I follow orders, even when I think they're wrong.
I'll do anything to win a bet.
I can't help but pocket loose coins and other trinkets I come across.
I dislike authority and can be insubordinate.
I drink too much when I get nervous.
talents: tie any knot in under five seconds
balance on a moving deck without effort
read the wind by feel alone
sing bawdy sea shanties in harmony

pirate.title: Pirate
pirate.description: You spent your life raiding ships and coastal settlements, living by a code of freedom and ruthlessness.
ideals: Freedom. The sea is freedom—the freedom to go anywhere and do anything.
Greed. I will do whatever it takes to become rich.
Honor. I don't steal from my own crew.
Respect. Respect is earned through action.
Might. The strongest rule the seas.
Aspiration. One day, I'll command my own fleet.
bonds: I'm loyal to my ship and crew, no matter what.
I will avenge a crewmate slain unfairly.
I secretly long to atone for my crimes.
Someone I wronged seeks revenge, and I fear the day they find me.
I stole a priceless treasure that others are still hunting.
flaws: I follow my greed blindly.
Violence is my first resort.
I can't resist a risky bet.
I hold grudges and act on them.
I value personal freedom over everything, even loyalty.
talents: flip a coin across their knuckles
tell if rum is watered down by scent
find the weak spot in any ship

soldier.title: Soldier
soldier.description: You served in a militia, army, or mercenary force, learning discipline and the harsh realities of war.
equipment: Trophy taken from a fallen enemy
Set of bone dice or deck of cards
ideals: Greater Good. Our lot is to lay down our lives for others.
Responsibility. I do what I must and obey just authority.
Independence. When people follow orders blindly, they embrace tyranny.
Might. In life as in war, the stronger force wins.
Respect. Those who fight beside me are worth dying for.
Glory. I must earn glory in battle for myself.
bonds: I would still lay down my life for the people I served with.
Someone saved my life on the battlefield. To this day, I will never leave a friend behind.
I fight for those who cannot fight for themselves.
I’ll never forget the crushing defeat my company suffered.
I carry a reminder of my lost comrades.
flaws: I obey the law, even if it causes misery.
I have little respect for those who haven't proven themselves in battle.
I made a terrible mistake in battle that haunts me.
My hatred of my enemies is blind and unreasoning.
I enjoy violence too much.
talents: recognize rank by gait or gear
drill others into shape with a stare
use improvised signals to coordinate tactics

urchin.title: Urchin
urchin.description: You grew up on the streets, relying on your wits and resilience to survive among the poor and forgotten.
equipment: Map of the city you grew up in
ideals: Respect. All people deserve respect.
Change. The lowly must be lifted up.
Freedom. No one tells me what to do.
Survival. I must always do what it takes to survive.
Community. We have to watch out for each other.
Aspiration. I'm going to make something of myself.
bonds: I owe my survival to another street urchin.
I will never forget the kindness of a stranger.
I protect those who can't protect themselves.
I was separated from my family and seek to find them.
I seek revenge against those who wronged me in childhood.
flaws: I will never fully trust anyone other than myself.
If I'm outnumbered, I will always run.
I will take risks if there's a reward.
I am slow to forgive offenses against me.
I pocket anything I see that looks valuable.
talents: navigate any city without a map
hide objects where no one checks
